recommendationevaluation

Class PrecisionRecall

  • java.lang.Object
    • recommendationevaluation.PrecisionRecall

  • public class PrecisionRecall
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the precision and recall for a user based upon a set of recommendations and a set of comparison data. The comparison data is movies the user has already rated, and will be considered 'good' recommendations. If the recommendations includes an item from the comparison data this will be a true positive.

    Ref: Collaborative Filtering Recommender Systems
    By Michael D. Ekstrand, John T. Riedl and Joseph A. Konstan

    • Method Detail

      • getPrecision

        public double getPrecision()
        Calculates and returns the precision for this set of recommendations

        Precision = True Positives / (True Positives + False Positives)

        Returns:
        The precision

      • getRecall

        public double getRecall()
        Calculates and returns the recall for this set of recommendations

        Recall = True Positives / (True Positives + False Negatives)

        Returns:
        The recall
